lines.gurmukhi: 1 vsqU inrdyS mMglwcrx
lines.transliteration_english: Ikonkaar Satigur Prasaadi ?

Shabad OS B.translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

lines.gurmukhi: iek kvwau pswau kir kudriq AMdir kIAw pswrw
lines.transliteration_english: Iku Kavaau Pasaau Kari Kudarati Andari Keeaa Paasaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The Lord’s one word (order) established and spread the whole nature in the form of the cosmos.

lines.gurmukhi: pMij qq prvwxu kir chuM KwxI ivic sB vrqwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Panji Tat Paravaanu Kari Chahoun Khaanee Vichi Sabh Varataaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Making the five elements authentic (He) regularized the working of the four mines of origin (egg, fetus, sweat, vegetation) of life.

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu DrqI AwKIAY kyvfu qolu Agws Akwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Dharatee Aakheeai Kayvadu Tolu Agaas Akaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: How to tell the expanse of earth and extension of sky?

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu pvxu vKwxIAY kyvfu pwxI qolu ivQwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Pavanu Vakhaaneeai Kayvadu Paanee Tolu Vidaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: How mush wider is air and what is the weight of water?

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu AgnI Bwru hY quil n qoil Aqolu BMfwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Aganee Bhaaru Hai Tuli N Tulu Atolu Bhandaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: How mush is the mass of fire cannot be estimated. The stores of that Lord cannot be counted and weighed.

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu AwKw isrjxhwrw ]1]
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Aakhaa Sirajanahaaraa ?1?

Shabad OS B.translation: When His creation can not be counted how can one know how great the Creator is.

lines.gurmukhi: 2 dYvI Aqy AwsurI sMpdw

Shabad OS B.translation: Godly and demonic properties

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu squ sMqoKu hY dXw Drm qy ArQu vIcwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Satu Santokhu Hai Dayaa Dharamu Tay Aradu Veechaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: How great are the truth, contentment, compassion, dharma, the meaning (of a concept) and its further elaboration?

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu kwmu kroDu hY kyvfu loB mohu AhMkwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Kaamu Karodhu Hai Kayvadu Lobhu Mohu Ahankaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: How much is the expansion of lust, anger, greed and infatuation?

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu diRsit vKwxIAY kyvfu rUp rMgu prkwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Drisati Vakhaaneeai Kayvadu Roopu Rangu Parakaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Visitors are of many kind and how many are forms and their hues?

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu suriq slwhIAY kyvfu sbdu ivQwru pswrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Surati Salaaheeai Kayvadu Sabadu Vidaaru Pasaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: How great is the consciousness and how much is the extension of Word?

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu vwsu invwsu hY kyvfu gMD sugMD Acwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Vaasu Nivaasu Hai Kayvadu Gandh Sougandhi Achaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: How many are the founts of flavor and what is the working of various fragrances?

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu rs ks AwKIAin kyvfu swd nwd EAMkwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Ras Kas Aakheeani Kayvadu Saad Naad Aoankaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Nothing can be told about the edible delights and inedible.

lines.gurmukhi: AMq ibAMq n pwrwvwr ]2]
lines.transliteration_english: Antu Biantu N Paaraavaaraa ?3?

Shabad OS B.translation: His expanse is infinite and beyond description.

lines.gurmukhi: 3 auho hI

Shabad OS B.translation: Invocation

lines.gurmukhi: caurwsIh lK join ivic jl Ql mhIAlu qiRBvx swrw
lines.transliteration_english: Chauraaseeh Lakh Joni Vichi Jalu Dalu Maheealu Tribhavanasaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Water earth and the nether world are full of eighty-four lacs of species.

lines.gurmukhi: iekis iekis join ivic jIA jMq Agxq Apwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Ikasi Ikasi Joni Vichi Jeea Jant Aganat Apaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: In each species innumerable creatures are there.

lines.gurmukhi: swis igrwis smwldw kir bHmMf kroiV Apwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Saasi Giraasi Samaaladaa Kari Brahamand Karorhi Soumaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Having created myriad universe He provides sustenance for them.

lines.gurmukhi: rom rom ivic riKEnu EAMkwr Akwru ivQwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Rom Rom Vichi Rakhiaonu Aoankaar Akaaru Vidaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: In each particle that Lord has extended Himself.

lines.gurmukhi: isir isir lyK AlyKu dw lyK AlyK aupwvxhwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Siri Siri Laykh Alaykhu Daa Laykh Alaykh Oupaavanuhaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: On the forehead of each creature are written his accounts; Only that creator is beyond all accounts and counts.

lines.gurmukhi: kudriq kvxu krY vIcwrw ]3]
lines.transliteration_english: Kudarati Kavanu Karai Veechaaraa ?3?

Shabad OS B.translation: Who can ponder upon His greatness?

lines.gurmukhi: 4 qQwc

Shabad OS B.translation: Godly and demonic properties

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu duK suKu AwKIAY kyvf hrK sog ivsQwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Doukhu Soukhu Aakheeai Kayvadu Harakhu Sogu Visadaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: What is the ambit of suffering and pleasure, happiness and sorrow?

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu scu vKwxIAY kyvfu kUVu kmwvx hwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Sachu Vakhaaneeai Kayvadu Koorhu Kamaavanahaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: How can the truth be described and how to say about the count of liars?

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu ruqI mwhu kir idh rwqI ivsmwdu vIcwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Routee Maah Kari Dih Raatee Visamaadu Veechaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: To divide seasons into months, days and nights is an awe-inspiring idea.

lines.gurmukhi: Awsw mnsw kyvfI kyvf nINd BuK Ahwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Aasaa Manasaa Kayvadee Kayvadu Neend Bhoukh Ahaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: How bigger are the hopes and desires and what is the circumference of sleep and hunger?

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu AwKwN Bwau Bau swNiq shij aupkwr ivkwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Aakhaan Bhaau Bhau Saanti Sahaji Oupakaar Vikaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: What could be told about love, fear, peace, equipoise, altruism and evil propensities?

lines.gurmukhi: qol Aqolu n qolx hwrw ]4]
lines.transliteration_english: Tolu Atolu N Tolanahaaraa ?4?

Shabad OS B.translation: These all are infinite and none can know about them.

lines.gurmukhi: 5 qQwc

Shabad OS B.translation: Godly and demonic properties

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu qol sMjog dw kyvfu qolu ivjogu vIcwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Tolu Sanjogu Daa Kayvadu Tolu Vijogu Veechaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: How to think about the periphery of meeting (Sanjog) and separation (vijog), because meeting and separation is part of a continuous process among the creatures.

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu hsxu AwKIAY kyvfu rovx dw ibsQwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Hasanu Aakheeai Kayvadu Rovan Daa Bisadaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: What is laughing and what are the limits of weeping and wailing?

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu hY inrivriq pKu kyvfu hY privriq pswrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Hai Niravirati Pakhu Kayvadu Hai Paravirati Pasaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: How to tell the perimeter of indulgence and repudiation?

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu AwKw puMn pwpu kyvfu AwKw moK duAwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Aakhaa Pounn Paapu Kayvadu Aakhaa Mokhu Duaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: How to describe the virtue, sin and the doors of liberation.

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu kudriq AwKIAY iekdUM kudriq lK Apwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Kudarati Aakheeai Ikadoon Kudarati Lakh Apaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Nature is indescribable because in it one extends to millions and millions.

lines.gurmukhi: dwnY kImiq nw pvY kyvfu dwqw dyvxhwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Daanai Keemati Naa Pavai Kayvadu Daataa Dayvanahaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The evaluation of that (great) Giver cannot be done and nothing can be told about His expansion.

lines.gurmukhi: AkQ kQw Aibgiq inrDwrw ]5]
lines.transliteration_english: Akad Kadaa Abigati Niradhaaraa ?5?

Shabad OS B.translation: His ineffable story, beyond all bases is always unmanifest.

lines.gurmukhi: 6 sMgq dw Pl

Shabad OS B.translation: The fruits of company

lines.gurmukhi: lK caurwsIh join ivic mwxs jnmu dulMBu aupwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Chauraaseeh Jooni Vichi Maanas Janamu Dulabhu Oupaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Among the eighty-four lacs of births, the human life is the rare one.

lines.gurmukhi: cwir vrn cwir mjhbw ihMdU muslmwn sdwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Chaari Varan Chaari Majahabaan Hindoo Mousalamaan Sadaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: This human got divided into four varnas and dharmas as also into Hindu and Musalman.

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy purK vKwxIAin nwir sumwir Agxq gxwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Purakh Vakhaaneeani Naari Soumaari Aganat Ganaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: How many are the males and females cannot be counted.

lines.gurmukhi: qRY gux mwieAw cilq hY bHmw ibsnu mhys rcwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Trai Goun Maaiaa Chalitu Hai Brahamaa Bisanu Mahaysu Rachaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: This world is fraudulent display of maya who with its there qualities has created even Brahma, Visan and Mahesa.

lines.gurmukhi: vyd kqybw vwcdy ieku swihbu duie rwh clwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Vayt Kataybaan Vaachaday Iku Saahibu Dui Raah Chalaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Hindus read Vedas and Muslims kaebas but the Lord is one while two ways have been devised to reach Him.

lines.gurmukhi: isv skqI ivic Kylu kir jog Bog bhu cilq bxwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Siv Sakatee Vichi Khaylu Kari Jog Bhog Bahu Chalitu Banaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Out of the Siva-Sakti i.e. maya, the illusions of yoga and bhoga (enjoyment) have been created.

lines.gurmukhi: swD AswD sMgiq Plu pwieAw ]6]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadh Asaadh Sangati Phalu Paaiaa ?6?

Shabad OS B.translation: One gets good or bad results according to the company of sadh or evildoers he keeps.

lines.gurmukhi: 7 ihMdU mq

Shabad OS B.translation: Hinduism

lines.gurmukhi: cwr vrn iCA drsnw swsqR byd purwx suxwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Chaari Varan Chhia Darasanaan Saasatr Bayd Puraanu Sounaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Hinduism put up expositions of the four varnas, six philosophies, Shastras, Bedas and Puranas.

lines.gurmukhi: dyvI dyv sryvVy dyv sQl qIrQ BrmwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Dayvee Dayv Sarayvaday Dayv Sadal Teerad Bharamaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: People worship gods and goddesses and undertake pilgrimage of holy place.

lines.gurmukhi: gx gMDrv ApCrw surpiq ieMdR ieMdRwsx CwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Gan Gandharab Apachharaan Surapati Indr Indraasan Chhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Within Hinduism are defined ganas, gandharvas, fairies, Indra, Indrasan, the throne of Indra.

lines.gurmukhi: jqI sqI sMqoKIAw isD nwQ Avqwr gxwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Jatee Satee Santokheeaan Sidh Naad Avataar Ganaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Yetis, satis, contented men, siddhas, naths and incarnations of God are included in it.

lines.gurmukhi: jp qp sMjm hom jg vrq nym neIvyd pujwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Jap Tap Sanjam Hom Jag Varat Naym Naeevayd Pujaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Modes of worship through recitation, penances, continence, burnt offerings, fasts, dos, don’ts, and oblations are there in it.

lines.gurmukhi: isKw sUqR mwlw iqlkipqr krm dyv krm kmwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Sikhaa Sootri Maalaa Tilak Pitar Karam Dayv Karam Kamaaiaa ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Hairknot, sacred thread, rosary, (sandal) mark on forehead, last rites for ancestors, rituals for gods are (also) prescribed in it.

lines.gurmukhi: puMn dwn aupdysu idVwieAw ]7]
lines.transliteration_english: Pounn Daan Oupadaysu Dirhaaiaa?7?

Shabad OS B.translation: The teaching of virtuous alms – giving is repeated in it time and again.

lines.gurmukhi: 8 muhMmdI mq

Shabad OS B.translation: Islam

lines.gurmukhi: pIr pYkMbr AaulIey gaus kuqb vlIaulh jwxy
lines.transliteration_english: Peer Pikanbar Auleeay Gaous Koutab Valeeulah Jaanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: In this religion (Islam) the pirs, prophets, aulias, gauns, qutbs and waliullah are well known.

lines.gurmukhi: syK mswiek AwKIAin lK lK dir dirvys vKwxy
lines.transliteration_english: Saykh Masaaik Aakheeani Lakh Lakh Dari Darivays Vakhaanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of sheikhs , mashaiks (practitioners) and dervishes are described in it.

lines.gurmukhi: suhdy lK shId hoie lK Abdwl mlMg imlwxy
lines.transliteration_english: Suhaday Lakh Saheed Hoi Lakh Abadaal Malag Milaanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of mean people, martyrs, faquirs and carefree persons are there.

lines.gurmukhi: isMDI rukn klMdrw lK aulmwau mulw maulwxy
lines.transliteration_english: Sindhee Roukan Kaladaraan Lakh Ulamaau Mulaa Maulaanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of sindhi rukhans, ulmas and maulanas (all religious denominations) are available in it.

lines.gurmukhi: srY srIAq AwKIAY qrk qrIkq rwh is\\\\wxy
lines.transliteration_english: Sarai Sareeati Aakheeai Tarak Tareekati Raah Siaanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are there who give exposition to the Muslim code of conduct (shariat) and many go on debating on the basis of tariqat, the methods of spiritual purification.

lines.gurmukhi: mwrPqI mwrUP lK hk hkIkq hukim smwxy
lines.transliteration_english: Maaradhatee Maaroodh Lakh Hak Hakeekati Houkami Samaanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Myriad people have become famous by reaching the last stage of knowledge, the marfati and many in His divine Will have merged into the haqiqat, the truth.

lines.gurmukhi: bujrkvwr hjwr muhwxy ]8]
lines.transliteration_english: Bujarakavaar Hajaar Muhaanay ?8?

Shabad OS B.translation: Thousands of elderly people were born and got perished.

lines.gurmukhi: 9 bHmx jwqwN

Shabad OS B.translation: Brahmin castes

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy bRwhmx swrsuq ivrqIsr lwgwieq loey
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Baahaman Saarasout Virateesar Laagaait Loay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many brahmins of sarasuat gotra, priests and lagait (a sount Indian sect) have existed.

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy gauV knaujIey qIrQ vwsI krdy Foey
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Gaurh Kanaujeeay Teerad Vaasee Karaday Ddhoay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are gaur, kanaujie  brahmins who reside in pilgrimage centres.

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy lK snauFIey pwNDy pMifq vYd Kloey
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Lakh Sanauddheeay Paandhay Pandit Vaid Khaloay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Lacs of people are called sanaudhie, pandhe, pandit and vaid.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAwN lK joqkI vyd vyduey l`K ploey
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Lakh Jotakee Vayd Vayduay Lakh Paloay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many lacs are astrologers and many people will-versed in Vedas and the Veduc lore have been.

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy lK kvIsrw bHm Bwt bHmwau bKoey
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Lakh Kaveesaraan Braham Bhaat Brahamaau Bakhoay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Lacs of people are known by the names of brahmins, bhats (eulogists) and poets.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAwN AiBAwgqw Gir Gir mMgdy lY knsoey
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Abhiaagataan Ghari Ghari Mangaday Lai Kanasoay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Becoming mendicants many people undertaking spying work go on begging and eating.

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy saux svwxI hoey ]9]
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Saoun Savaanee Hoay ?9?

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are there who forecast about the good and bad omens and thus earn their livelihood.

lines.gurmukhi: 10 K`qRRI jwqwN

Shabad OS B.translation: Kashatriyas

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy KqRI bwrhI kyqiVAwN hI bwvMjwhI
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Khatree Baarahee Kaytarhiaan Hee Baavanjaahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many khatris (Khatris in Punjab) belong to twelve and many to fifty-two clans.

lines.gurmukhi: pwvwDy pwcwiDAwN PlIAwN KoKrwiexu AvgwhI
lines.transliteration_english: Paavaadhay Paachaadhiaa Phaleeaan Khokharaainu Avagaahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many among them are called pavadhe, pachadhia, phalian, khokharain.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw cauVoqrI kyqiVAw syrIn ivlwhI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Chaurhotaree Kaytarhiaan Sayreen Vilaahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are chaurotari and many serin have passed away.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw Avqwr hoie ckÍriq rwjy drgwhI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Avataar Hoi Chakravarati Raajay Daragaahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many were universal kings in the forms of incarnation (of God).

lines.gurmukhi: sUrjvMsI AwKIAin somvMs sUrvIr ispwhI
lines.transliteration_english: Soorajavansee Aakheeani Somavans Sooraveer Sipaahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are known as belonging to sun and moon dynasties.

lines.gurmukhi: Drmrwie Drmwqmw Drmu vIcwru n byprvwhI
lines.transliteration_english: Dharam Raai Dharamaatamaa Dharamu Veechaaru N Bayparavaahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many religious persons like the god of dharma and thinkers on dharma and then many caring for none have been.

lines.gurmukhi: dwn KVg mMqu Bgiq slwhI ]10]
lines.transliteration_english: Daanu Kharhagu Mantu Bhagati Salaahee ?10?

Shabad OS B.translation: The real khatris is he who gives charitably, wears arms and remembers God with loving devotion.

lines.gurmukhi: 11 vYS jwqI

Shabad OS B.translation: Vaishya caste

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy vYs vKwxIAin rwjpUq rwvq vIcwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Vais Vakhaaneeani Raajapoot Raavat Veechaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Among vais rajput and many others have been considered.

lines.gurmukhi: qUAr gauV pvwr lK mlx hws cauhwx icqwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Tooar Gaurh Pavaar Lakh Malan Haas Chauhaan Chitaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many, such as tuars, gaur, pavar, malan, Has, chauhan etc, are remembered.

lines.gurmukhi: kCvwhy rwTauV lK rwxy rwie BUmIey BwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Kachhavaahay Raatdaurh Lakh Raanay Raaay Bhoomeeay Bhaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Kachavahe, Rauthor etc. many kings and landlords have passed away.

lines.gurmukhi: bwG bGyly kyqVy blvMf lK buMdyly kwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Baagh Baghaylay Kaytarhay Balavand Lakh Boundaylay Kaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Bagh, Baghele and many other powerful Bundele have existed earlier.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw hI BurtIey drbwrwN AMdir drbwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Hee Bhurateeay Darabaaraan Andari Darabaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many were Bhats who were courtiers in the bigger courts.

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy guxI BdauVIey dyis dyis vfy ieqbwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Ganee Bhadaurheeay Daysi Daysi Vaday Itabaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many talented persons belonging to Bhadaurie were acknowledged in the country and abroad.

lines.gurmukhi: haumY muey n haumY mwrI ]11]
lines.transliteration_english: Haoumai Muay N Haoumai Maaree ?11?

Shabad OS B.translation: But they all perished in their ego, which they could not decimate.

lines.gurmukhi: 12 goqwN qy ikrq dIAwN jwqwN

Shabad OS B.translation: Castes and working classes

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy sUd sdwiedy ikqVy kwieQ ilKxhwry
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Sood Sadaaiay Kitarhay Kaaid Likhanahaaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are Sud and many are kaith, the bookkeepers.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw hI bwxIey ikqVy BwBiVAw suinAwry
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Hee Baaneeay Kitarhay Bhaabharhiaan Souniaaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are traders and many more Jain goldsmiths.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw lK jwt hoie kyqiVAw CINby sYswry
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Lakh Jat Hoi Kaytarhiaan Chheenbai Saisaaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: In this world millions are Jats and millions are calico printers.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw TwTyirAw kyqiVAw lohwr ivcwry
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaa Tdaatdayriaa Kaytarhiaan Lohaar Vichaaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are coppersmiths and many are considered ironsmiths.

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy qylI AwKIAin ikqVy hlvweI bwjwry
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Taylee Aakheeani Kitarhay Halavaaee Baajaaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are oilmen and many confectioners are available in the market.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw lK pMKIey ikqVy nweI qY vxjwry
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Lakh Pankheeay Kitarhay Naaee Tai Vanajaaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are messengers, many barbers and many more businessmen.

lines.gurmukhi: chu vrnw dy goq Apwry ]12]
lines.transliteration_english: Chahu Varanaan Day Got Apaaray ?12?

Shabad OS B.translation: In fact, in all the four varnas, there are many castes and sub castes.

lines.gurmukhi: 13 vrx, mq

Shabad OS B.translation: Varna-sects,

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy igrhI AwKIAin kyqiVAw lK iPrin audwsI
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Girahee Aakheeani Kaytarhiaan Lakh Dhirani Udaasee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are householders and millions are spending indifferent life.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw jogIsrw kyqiVAwN hoie sMinAwsI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Jaygeesuraan Kaytarhiaan Hoay Sanniaasee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are Yogisuras (great yogis) and many are Sanniasi.

lines.gurmukhi: sMinAwsI ds nwm Dir jogI bwrh pMQ invwsI
lines.transliteration_english: Sanniaasee Das Naam Dhari Jogee Baarah Pand Nivaasee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Sanniasi are of then names and yogis have been divided into twelve sects.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw lK prm hMs ikqVy bwnpRsq bnvwsI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Lakh Param Hans Kitarhay Baanaprasat Banavaasee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are ascetics of highest order (paramhans) and many are living in the jungles.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw hI fMf Dwr ikqVy jYnI jIA dYAwsI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Hee Dand Dhaar Kitarhay Jainee Jeea Daiaasee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many keep sticks in the hands and many are compassionate Jains.

lines.gurmukhi: iCA Gir iCA gur AwKIAin iCA aupdys Bys AiBAwsI
lines.transliteration_english: Chhia Ghari Chhia Guri Aakheeani Chhia Oupadays Bhays Abhiaasee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Six are the Shastras, six their teachers and six their guises, disciplines and teachings.

lines.gurmukhi: iCA ruiq bwrh mwh kir sUrj ieko bwrh rwsI
lines.transliteration_english: Chhia Routi Baarah Maah Kari Sooraju Iko Baarah Raasee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Six seasons and twelve months are there but moving into each of the twelve zodiac signs the sun is the only one.

lines.gurmukhi: gurw gUrU siqgur AibnwsI ]13]
lines.transliteration_english: Guraa Guroo Satiguru Abinaasee ?13?

Shabad OS B.translation: The Guru of the gurus, the true Guru (God) is indestructible).

lines.gurmukhi: 14 swD

Shabad OS B.translation: Sadhu

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy swD vKwxIAin swDsMgiq ivic praupkwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Saadh Vakhaaneeani Saadhasangati Vichi Paraoupakaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many sadhus are there who move in the holy congregation and are benevolent.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw lK sMq jn kyqiVAw inj Bgiq BMfwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Lakh Sant Jan Kaytarhiaan Nij Bhagati Bhandaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of saints are there who continuously go on filling the coffers of their devotion.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw jIvn mukiq bHm igAwnI bHm vIcwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Jeevan Moukati Braham Giaanee Braham Veechaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are liberated in life; they have knowledge of Brahm and meditate upon Brahm.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw smdrsIAw kyqiVAw inrml inrMkwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Samadaraseeaan Kaytarhiaan Niramal Nirankaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are egalitarians and many more are spotless, clean and followers of the formless Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy lK ibbykIAw ikqVy dyh ibdyh AkwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Lakh Bibaykeeaan Kitarhay Dayh Bidayh Akaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are there with analytical wisdom; many are body less though they have bodies i.e. they are above the desires of body.

lines.gurmukhi: Bwie Bgiq BY vrqxw shj smwiD bYrwg svwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Bhaai Bhagati Bhai Varatanaa Sahaji Samaadhi Bairaag Savaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: They conduct themselves in loving devotion and make equipoise and detachment their vehicle to move around.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Pl grbu invwrI ]14]
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Garabu Nivaaree ?14?

Shabad OS B.translation: Erasing ego from the self, gurmukhs obtain the fruits of the supreme delight.

lines.gurmukhi: 15 AswD jn

Shabad OS B.translation: Evil doers

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy lK AswD jg ivic ikqVy cor jwr jUAwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Lakh Asaadh Jag Vichi Kitarhay Chor Jaar Jooaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: In this world are myrids of wicked persons, thieves, bad characters and gamblers.

lines.gurmukhi: vtvwVy Tig kyqVy kyqiVAw inMdk AvIcwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Vatavaarhay Tdagi Kaytarhay Kaytarhiaan Nidak Avichaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are highway robbers. Dupers, backbiters and devoid of thinking.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw AikrqGx ikqVy bymuK qy AxcwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Akirataghan Kitarhay Baymoukh Tay Anachaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are ungrateful, apostate and have spoiled conduct.

lines.gurmukhi: sÍwim DRohI ivsvws Gwq lUx hrwmI mUrK BwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Saami Dhrauhee Visavaasi Ghaat Loon Haraamee Moorakh Bhaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Killers of their masters, unfaithful, not true to their salt and morons are also there.

lines.gurmukhi: ibKlIpiq vysuAw rvq md mqvwly vfy ivkwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Bikhaleepati Vaysuaa Ravat Mad Matavaalay Vaday Vikaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are deeply engrossed in evil propensities, untrue to their salt, drunkards and evil-doers.

lines.gurmukhi: ivst ivroDI kyqVy kyqiVAw kUVy kUiVAwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Visat Virodhee Kaytarhay Kaytarhiaan Koorhay Koorhiaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many by becoming mediators raise antagonism and many are mere tellers of lies.

lines.gurmukhi: gur pUry ibnu AMiq KuAwrI ]15]
lines.transliteration_english: Gur Pooray Binu Anti Khuaaree ?15?

Shabad OS B.translation: Without surrendering before they true Guru, all will run from pillar to post (and will get nothing).

lines.gurmukhi: 16 Xvn mqwN dy Byd

Shabad OS B.translation: Sects among semitic religions

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy suMnI AwKIAin ikqVy eIsweI mUsweI
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Sounnee Aakheeani Kitarhay Eesaaee Moosaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are Christians, Sunnis and followers of Moses.  Many are Rafizis and Mulahids

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw hI rwPjI ikqVy mulihd gxq n AweI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaa Hee Raadhajee Kitarhay Mulahid Ganat N Aaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: (those who do not believe in the day of judgement).

lines.gurmukhi: lK iPrMgI ArmnI rUmI jMgI dusmx dweI
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Dhirangee Iramanee Roomee Jangee Dousaman Daaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions are firangis (Europeans), Arminis, Rumis and other warriors fighting the enemy.

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy seIXd AwKIAin ikqVy qurkmwn duinAweI
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Saeeyad Aakheeani Kitarhay Turakamaan Douniaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: In the world many are known by the names of Sayyads and Turks.

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy mugl pTwx hin hbsI qy iklmwk AvweI
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Mougal Patdaan Hani Habasee Tai Kilamaak Avaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are Mughals, Pathans, Negroes and Kilmaks (followers of Solomon).

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw eImwn ivic ikqVy byeImwn blweI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Eemaan Vichi Kitarhay Bayeemaan Balaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are spending honest life and many live by dishonesty.

lines.gurmukhi: nykI bdI n lukY lukweI ]16]
lines.transliteration_english: Naykee Badee N Loukai Loukaaee ?16?

Shabad OS B.translation: Even then, the virtue and evil cannot remain hidden

lines.gurmukhi: 17 A`f A`f hwlqwN

Shabad OS B.translation: Different circumstances

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy dwqy mMgqy ikqVy vYd kyqVy rogI
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Daatay Mangatay Kitarhay Vaid Kaytarhay Rogee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are doners, many beggars and many the physicians and the diseased ones.

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy shij sMjog ivic ikqVy ivCuiV hoie ivjogI
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Sahaji Sanjog Vichi Kitarhay Vichhurhi Hoi Vijogee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many being in the state of spiritual calmness are associated (with the beloved one) and many get ting separated are undergoing the pangs of separation.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw BuKy mrin kyqiVAw rwjy rs BogI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Bhoukhay Marani Kaytarhiaan Raajay Ras Bhogee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are dying of starvation whereas many are kinds who are enjoying their kingdoms.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw dy sohly kyqiVAw duKu rovin sogI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Day Sohilay Kaytarhiaan Doukhu Rovani Sogee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are singing happily and many are weeping and wailing.

lines.gurmukhi: dunIAw Awvx jwvxI ikqVI hoeI ikqVI hogI
lines.transliteration_english: Douneeaan Aavan Jaavanee Kitarhee Hoee Kitarhee Hogee.

Shabad OS B.translation: The world is transitory; it has been created many times and still would be created again and again.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw hI sicAwr kyqiVAw dgwbwj drogI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Hee Sachiaar Kaytarhiaan Dagaabaaj Darogee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are leading truthful life and many are cheats and liars.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK ko jogIsur jogI ]17]
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Ko Jogeesur Jogee ?17?

Shabad OS B.translation: Any rare one is the true yogi and a yogi of the highest order.

lines.gurmukhi: 18 srIr dIAwN A`f A`f hwlqwN

Shabad OS B.translation: Different states of body

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy AMnHy AwKIAin kyqiVAwN hI idsin kwxy
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Annhay Aakheeani Kaytarhiaan Hee Disani Kaanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are blind and many one-eyed.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAwN cu`nHy iPrin ikqVy rqIAwnHy aukqwxy
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Chounhay Dhirani Kitarhay Rateeaanay Oukataanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are small eyed and many suffer from night-blindness.

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy nkty guxguxy ikqVy boly bucy lwxy
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Nakatay Gounagounay Kitarhay Bolay Bouchay Laanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are with clipped noses, many snufflers, deaf and many are earless.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw iglHV glIr AMig rsaulI vyix ivhwxy
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Gilharh Galee Angi Rasaulee Vayni Vihaanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are suffering from goiter, and many have tumors in their organs,

lines.gurmukhi: tuMfy bwNfy kyqVy gMjy luMjy koVHI jwxy
lines.transliteration_english: Tounday Baanday Kaytarhay Ganjay Lujay Korhhee Jaanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are maimed ones, bald, without hands and stricken with leprosy.

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy lUly ipMguly ikqVy ku`by hoie kuVwxy
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Loolay Pingulay Kitarhay Koubay Hoi Kurhaanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are suffering for being disabled, cripple and hunchback.

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy Kusry hIjVy kyqiVAw guMgy quqlwxy
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Khousaray Heejarhay Kaytarhiaa Goungay Toutalaanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many eunuchs, many dumb and many are stammerers.

lines.gurmukhi: gur pUry ivxu Awvx jwxy ]18]
lines.transliteration_english: Gur Pooray Vinu Aavan Jaanay ?18?

Shabad OS B.translation: Away from the perfect Guru they will all remain in the cycle of transmigration.

lines.gurmukhi: 19 igxqI

Shabad OS B.translation: Count

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw piqswh jig ikqVy msliq krin vjIrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Patisaah Jagi Kitarhay Masalati Karani Vajeeraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are kinds and many are their ministers.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw aumrwau lK mnsbdwr hjwr vfIrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Oumaraau Lakh Manasabadaar Hajaar Vadeeraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are their satraps, other rankers and thousands of them are great people.

lines.gurmukhi: ihkmiq ivic hkIm lK ikqVy qrks bMd AmIrw
lines.transliteration_english: Hikamati Vichi Hakeem Lakh Kitarhay Tarakas Band Ameeraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions are physicians adept in medicine and millions are armed rich men.

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy cwkr cwkrI BoeI myT mhwvq mIrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Chaakar Chaakaree Bhoee Maytd Mahaavat Meeraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are servants, grass cutters, police personnel, mahouts and chieftains.

lines.gurmukhi: lK PrwS lK swrvwn mIrwN Kor seIs vhIrw
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Dharaas Lakh Saaravaan Meeraakhor Saees Vaheeraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of flowers, camel drivers, syces, and grooms are there.

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy lK jlybdwr gwfIvwn clwie gfIrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Lakh Jalaybadaar Gaadeevaan Chalaai Gadeeraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions are maintenance officers and drivers of the royal carriages.

lines.gurmukhi: CVIdwr drvwn KlIrw ]19]
lines.transliteration_english: Chharheedaar Daravaan Khaleeraa ?19?

Shabad OS B.translation: Many stick-holding gatekeepers stand and wait.

lines.gurmukhi: 20 igxqI

Shabad OS B.translation: Count

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy lK ngwrcI kyqiVAw FolI shnweI
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Lakh Nagaarachee Kaytarhiaan Ddholee Sahanaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are kettledrum and drum-beaters and many play on clarinets.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw hI qwiePy FwFI bcy klwvq gweI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Hee Taaidhay Ddhaaddhee Bachay Kalaavat Gaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are prostitutes, bards and singers of qauwali, a particular type of song sung usually in-group in particular modes mostly by Muslims.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw bhurUpIey bwjIgr lK BMf AqweI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Hee Bahuroopeeay Baajeegar Lakh Bhand Ataaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are mimics, acrobats and million are jesters.

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy lK mswlcI smw crwg krin rusnweI
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Lakh Masaalachee Samaa Charaag Karani Rousanaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are torchbearers who light the torches.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw hI korcI Awml poS islh suKdweI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Hee Korachee Aamalu Pos Silah Soukhadaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are the keepers of army store and many are officers who wear comfortable suit of armor.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw hI Awbdwr ikqVy bwvrcI nwnvweI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Hee Aabadaar Kitarhay Baavarachee Naanavaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are water carriers and cooks who cook nans, a kind of round, flat bread.

lines.gurmukhi: qMbolI qoskcI suhweI ]20]
lines.transliteration_english: Tanbolee Tosakachee Suhaaee ?20?

Shabad OS B.translation: Betel sellers and incharge of store room for precious articles of their own glory.

lines.gurmukhi: 21 igxqI

Shabad OS B.translation: Count

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw Kusboiedwr kyqiVAw rMgryj rMgolI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaa Khousaboidaar Kaytarhiaa Rangarayj Rangolee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are perfume sellers and many dyers who use colors to make many designs (rangolis).

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy myvydwr hin hufk hufkIey lolix lolI
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Mayvaydaar Hani Hudak Hudakeeay Lolani Lolee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are servants working on contract and many are frolicsome prostitutes.

lines.gurmukhi: iKjmiqgwr Kvws lK golMdwj qopkI qolI
lines.transliteration_english: Khijamatigaar Khavaas Lakh Goladaaj Topakee Tolee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are personal maidservants, bomb-throwers, cannoners and many are carriers of war material.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw qhvIldwr musrPdwr drogy ElI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Tahaveeladaar Mousaradhadaar Darogay Aolee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are revenue officers, superintending officers, policemen and estimators.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw ikrswx hoie kir ikrswxI Aqulu AqolI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Kirasaan Hoi Kari Kirasaanee Atulu Atolee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are farmers who weigh and take care of the agricultural crop and its allied works.

lines.gurmukhi: musqOPI bUqwq lK mIrswmy bKsI kol kolI
lines.transliteration_english: Mousataudhee Bootaat Lakh Meerasaamay Bakhasee Lai Kolee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions are accountants, home secretaries, oath officers, finance ministers and tribal people who prepare bows and arrows.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw dIvwn hoie krin kroVI mulk FMFolI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Deevaan Hoi Karani Karorhee Mulak Ddhanddholee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many becoming custodians of property administer the country.

lines.gurmukhi: rqn pdwrQ mol AmolI ]21]
lines.transliteration_english: Ratan Padaarad Mol Amolee ?21?

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are there who have the accounts of invaluable jewels etc. and deposit them properly.

lines.gurmukhi: 22 igxqI

Shabad OS B.translation: Count

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw hI jauhrI lK srwP bjwj vpwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Hee Jauharee Lakh Saraadh Bajaaj Vapaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are jewelers, goldsmiths and cloth merchants.

lines.gurmukhi: saudwgr saudwgrI gwNDI kwsyry pwswrI
lines.transliteration_english: Saudaagar Saudaagaree Gaandhee Kaasayray Paasaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Then there are itinerant traders, perfumers, coppersmiths and sellers of provision.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw prcUnIey kyqiVAw dlwl bjwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Parachooneeay Kaytarhiaan Dalaal Bajaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are retailers and many are brokers in the market.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw isklIgrwN ikqVy lK kmgr kwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Sikaleegaraan Kitarhay Lakh Kamagar Kaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are arms manufacturers and many are working on alchemical materials.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw kumiHAwr lK kwgd kut Gxy lUxwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Koumhiaar Lakh Kaagad Kout Ghanay Loonaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are potters, paper pounders and producers of salt.

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy drjI DobIAwN ikqVy jr lohy isr hwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Darajee Dhobeeaan Kitarhay Jar Lohay Sir Haaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are tailors, washermen, and goldplaters.

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy BVBUMjy BiTAwrI ]22]
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Bharhabhoonjay Bhatdiaaree ?22?

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are grain parchers who make fire in hearths specially designed for parching grain.

lines.gurmukhi: 23 igxqI

Shabad OS B.translation: Count

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw kwrUMjVy kyqiVAw dbgr kwsweI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaa Kaaroonjarhay Kaytarhiaa Dabagar Kaasaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are green grocers, many are makers of kuppas, large vessels made from raw hide usually for holding and carrying oil, and may more are butchers.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw muinAwr lK kyqiVAw cimAwr ArweI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaa Mouniaar Lakh Kaytarhiaa Chamiaaru Araaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are toy and bangle sellers and many are leather workers and vegetable growers-cum-sellers.

lines.gurmukhi: BMghyry hoie kyqVy bgnIgrw klwl hvweI
lines.transliteration_english: Bhangahayray Hoi Kaytarhay Baganeegaraan Kalaal Havaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are toy and bangle sellers and many are leather workers and vegetable growers-cum-sellers.

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy BMgI posqI AmlI soPI GxI lukweI
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Bhangee Posatee Amalee Sodhee Ghanee Loukaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions drink hemp and many are brewers of wine from rice and barley, and confectioners are also many there.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw khwr lK gujr lK AhIr gxweI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaa Kahaar Lakh Gujar Lakh Aheer Ganaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of cattle breeders, palanquin bearers and milk-men may be presently counted.

lines.gurmukhi: ikqVy hI lK cUhVy jwiq Ajwiq snwq AlweI
lines.transliteration_english: Kitarhay Hee Lakh Chooharhay Jaati Ajaati Sanaati Alaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of scavengers and outcaste pariahs (chandal) are there.

lines.gurmukhi: nwv Qwv lK kIm n pweI ]23]
lines.transliteration_english: Naav Daav Lakh Keem N Paaee ?23?

Shabad OS B.translation: Thus myriads are names and places which cannot be counted.

lines.gurmukhi: 24 sB gurmuK bxoN

Shabad OS B.translation: All should become gurmukh

lines.gurmukhi: auqm mDm nIc lK gurmuiK nIchu nIc sdwey
lines.transliteration_english: Outam Madham Neech Lakh Guramoukhi Neechahu Neech Sadaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions are low, medium and high but gurmukh calls himself low of the lowly.

lines.gurmukhi: pYrI pY pw Kwk hoie gurmuiK gurisKu Awpu gvwey
lines.transliteration_english: Pairee Pai Paa Khaaku Hoi Guramoukhi Gurasikhu Aapu Gavaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: He becoming dust of the feet and guru’s disciple erases his ego.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq Bau Bwau kir syvk syvw kwr kmwey
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Bhau Bhaau Kari Sayvak Sayvaa Kaar Kamaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Going with love and respect to the holy congregation, he serves there.

lines.gurmukhi: imTw bolx inv clxu hQhu dy kY Blw mnwey
lines.transliteration_english: Mitdaa Bolan Niv Chalanu Hadahu Day Kai Bhalaa Manaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: He speaks mildly, behaves humbly and even by giving something to somebody wishes good of others.

lines.gurmukhi: sbid suriq ilvlIxu hoie drgh mwx inmwxw pwey
lines.transliteration_english: Sabadi Surati Liv Leenu Hoi Daragah Maan Nimaanaa Paaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Absorbing consciousness into the Word that humble person receives honour in the court of the Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: clxu jwix Ajwxu hoie Awsw ivic inrws vlwey
lines.transliteration_english: Chalanu Jaani Ajaanu Hoi Aasaa Vichi Niraasu Valaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Considering death as the last truth and becoming unknown to cunningness he remains indifferent to hopes and desires.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Plu AlKu lKwey ]24]8]
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Alakhu Lakhaaay ?24?8?

Shabad OS B.translation: The imperceptible fruit of delight is seen and received only by Gurmukh.

lines.gurmukhi: ibsmwdih ibsmwd Ascrjih Ascrj giq
lines.transliteration_english: Bisamaadahi Bisamaada , Asacharajahi Asacharaj Gati ?

Shabad OS B.translation: God - manifest Satguru's play is ecstatic and blissful, astonishing beyond astonishment,

lines.gurmukhi: Awid purK prmwid AdBuq prmdBuq Bey ]1]8]
lines.transliteration_english: Aadi Purakh Paramaadi , Adabhout Paramadabhout Bhaay ?1?8?

Shabad OS B.translation: unimaginably wondrous, and amazing beyond perception.

lines.gurmukhi: Ascrjih Ascrj giq ibsmwdih ibsmwd
lines.transliteration_english: Asacharajahi Asacharaj Gati , Bisamaadahi Bisamaad ?

Shabad OS B.translation: (Describing the wondrous state of Guru who is immanent of the Lord), we have reached the awesome of awesome state, in the most enrapturing ecstatic state,

lines.gurmukhi: AdBuq prmdBuq Bey Awid purK prmwid ]2]8]
lines.transliteration_english: Adabhout Paramadabhout Bhaay , Aadi Purakh Paramaadi ?2?8?

Shabad OS B.translation: wonderfully strange condition of transcendence seeing the magnificence of the Lord .

lines.gurmukhi: Awid purK prmwid sÍwd rs gMD Agocr
lines.transliteration_english: Aadi Purakh Paramaadi , Svaad Ras Gandh Agochar ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Primordial Lord (God) has no beginning. He is beyond and still farther. He is free of such mundane worldly pleasures like taste, desires and fragrances.

lines.gurmukhi: diRsit drs As prs suriq miq sbd mnocr
lines.transliteration_english: Drisati Daras As Parasa , Surati Mati Sabad Manochar ?

Shabad OS B.translation: He is beyond vision, touch, reach of mind, intelligence and words.

lines.gurmukhi: log byd giq igAwn lKy nhIN AlK AByvw
lines.transliteration_english: Log Bayd Gati Giaana , Lakhay Naheen Alakh Abhayvaa ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The imperceptible and unattached Lord cannot be known by study of Vedas and through other earthly knowledge.

lines.gurmukhi: nyq nyq kir nmo nmo nm siqgur dyvw ]3]8]
lines.transliteration_english: Nayt Nayt Kari Namo Namo , Nam Satigur Dayvaa ?3?8?

Shabad OS B.translation: Satguru who is embodiment of Lord and inhabits His divine radiance is infinite. Thus, he is worthy of salutation and obeisance in all the three times-past, present and future. (8)
